project_descr: Preventive Development Support on Disaster Risk Management

outputs.output_descr: The project aimed at strengthening the policy framework and institutional arrangements for managing natural resources and addressing land tenure, climate change, disaster, and environmental management.

The project will conduct an assessment of the affected areas and to draw up a preparedness and recovery strategy for the attention of the Disaster Management Department in the Office of National Security
